trait.name: Mimicry
text: Ravenfolk doom croakers can mimic the voices of others with uncanny accuracy. They have advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks involving audible mimicry.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The doom croaker has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The doom croaker's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: blight, call lightning, clairvoyance, insect plague

action.name: Ghost Wings
text: The ravenfolk doom croaker furiously "beats" a set of phantasmal wings. Every creature within 5 feet of the ravenfolk must make a successful DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the start of the ravenfolk's next turn.

action.name: Radiant Runestaff
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) radiant damage.
